alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Juno Ridge, or near Juno Beach, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Tequesta, Juno Beach, Royal Palm Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Palm Beach International Airport, Port Of Palm Beach, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, Juno Ridge and Downtown West Palm Beach. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
